00092 typedef struct eolComponent_S
00093 {
00094   eolUint       id;
00095   eolLine       name;
00096   eolRectFloat  rect;           
00097   eolRect       bounds;         
00098   eolBool       canHasFocus;

00100   eolInt        state;
00101   eolInt        oldState;
00102   eolUint       type;
00103   void        * componentData;
00104   void          (*data_free)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00105   void          (*data_draw)(struct eolComponent_S *component,eolRect bounds);
00106   void          (*data_move)(struct eolComponent_S *component,eolRect bounds);
00107   eolBool       (*data_update)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00108   eolInt        (*data_get_state)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00109   eolBool       (*data_changed)(struct eolComponent_S *component);
00110 }eolComponent;
